extendedInfo.description: BOOMSHAKALAKA!!!!Jam with your favorite stars from all 30 NBA teams in over-the-top, high-flying, 2-on-2 arcade basketball just like you remember it â and like youâve never seen before!** NBA JAM is a larger-than-life game (300MB+), so we strongly recommend connecting to WiFi before downloading. Trust us, this Jam is worth the wait.**PLAY NOW! PLAY CLASSIC! PLAY HEAD-TO-HEAD AGAINST A FRIEND!3 modes of play let you ball the way you want:â¢ Play Now â Select a team and jump right into the ballgame.â¢ Classic Campaign â Defeat all other teams to win the championship, and unlock legends, hidden players, and outrageous cheats.â¢ Local Multiplayer â Go big head 2 big head against a friend via local WiFi or BluetoothYOUâRE ON FIRE â ON ANDROID!If youâre from the Old School, youâll feel the â90s nostalgia while you play the hottest arcade sports game on the Android Market. Featuring the voice of Tim Kitzrow (the original NBA JAM play-by-play announcer), youâll hear all the classic catchphrases plus a few new ones. This JAM is all about âboomshakalakaâ- and beyond!  Go to the hole. Go strong. Go for the monster jam. KABOOM!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Worked fine then crashed
reviews.comment: It works for a couple weeks then I woudln\'t let me play anymore. It kicks me out while loading a new game. Please fix this or how can I get my money back????
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what everyone is talking about it runs fine.Controls are really smooth and easy to use, graphics and animations are also really good.
reviews.author: Brodyn Thompson

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: Hands down the best sports game app. Worked perfectly until recent update. Now it crashes right before game is about to start for Galaxy S. EA is slippen, please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best android game I\'ve played!!!
reviews.comment: A friend recommended this game. It reminds me of the old nba jam! I love how the controls work.
reviews.author: Shane Deel

reviews.title: Best sports game...
reviews.comment: ...on Android.  Brings me back to the Sega Gen days, but with better graphics.  Some of the best touch-screen controls available.
reviews.author: andrew smith

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: AWESOME!!!! Great game, but would u PLEASE update the rosters?! Ray Allen isn\'t on the Celtics anymore! Dwight Howard isn\'t on the Magic anymore! Monta Ellis isn\'t on the Warriors anymore! Fix the rosters, and I would give this 5 stars!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brings back the fun memories but needs work!
reviews.comment: Bought it and instantly started playing it. Controls are easy enough once you learn them BUT the game keeps randomly quitting on me! I haven\'t been able to get passed the 2nd quarter. Please fix!! HTC One S
reviews.author: Max Turcios

reviews.title: Need to update rosters
reviews.comment: Need to update rosters.  They are more than a yr old.   On a minor note, sometimes stats are wrong like player with highest assist or scoring doesn\'t show green but it rather picks the wrong player...not a big deal though
reviews.author: Samer Matti

reviews.title: D-pad support
reviews.comment: This game would be much better if we could use a flipping controller! I\'m a idiotic for assuming this game would have controller support!
reviews.author: Bobby McCleery

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: my favourite app on my s3. easy to play. my only request to improve the game is to update the rosters. that is my obly request. PLEASE UPDATE THE ROSTERS
reviews.author: Joseph Deplaa

reviews.title: CRASHES ! Cannot Play at All
reviews.comment: While loading game. If i could actually play the game I paid for I would rate it 5 stars best app ... but I can\'t so I\'m still playing GTA 3
reviews.author: Christian Guzman

reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy S II from Straight Talk. Plays perfect. No issues downloading. And very easy controls. Go Bulls!!!
reviews.author: Trevor Wirick

reviews.title: NBA JAMS
reviews.comment: Wow the best game ever on android, controlls are perfect,graphics are stunning, better than original,finally a game worth buying Marcus NOTE2
reviews.author: Marcus Tellez

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy
reviews.comment: Was able to play a few games with no issues. Now the game acts like it\'s loading and then goes back to the home screen. I wouldn\'t buy this app until they fix this issue.
reviews.author: JC Meacham

reviews.title: No Nexus 4 support?
reviews.comment: Please update your app to support the current development device sold by Google. It\'s pretty good on the Nexus 7. It was pretty good on my Galaxy Nexus. It won\'t even load properly on the Nexus 4.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply amazing
reviews.comment: This game looks great and the controls are perfect for a touch screen.  It looks better then it did 20 years ago on the NES. A must buy. Super fun.
reviews.author: TeDarrius Escott

reviews.title: Argh!
reviews.comment: Super fun game play, and I love the updated rosters and graphics. 2 stars, however, because it WONT STOP CRASHING. I am keeping the game, in hopes that this bug gets fixed.
reviews.author: Joe Kapp

reviews.title: Basketball junkie
reviews.comment: I never rated no game on Android before.... But finally they got a great game worth rating .... Works great on samsung Galaxy S2.... I give it five Starz ....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Want my money back!!!
reviews.comment: This hasn\'t worked since the day I bought it!! It will start  to load then crash. Brands NEW and have not got to play it once!! Waste of money
reviews.author: Kiefer Musselman

reviews.title: Not compatible with nexus 4
reviews.comment: Downloaded and updated and will not run past the loading screen. App shuts down. Could not get the refund from Google cause dl takes longer than 15 mins. Don\'t buy if you have a nexus 4 or jelly bean 4.2.
reviews.author: A Google User
